snippet: When the couple who created the embryos disagree, who gets custody? Here, a court ruled for a woman whose fertility was destroyed by cancer treatment.
abstract: Appeals court in Chicago rules 2 to 1 that Karla Dunston, whose fertility was ruined by cancer treatment, may use frozen embryos she created with ex-boyfriend Jacob Szafranski, over his objections.
lead_paragraph: When the couple who created the embryos disagree, who gets custody? Here, a court ruled for a woman whose fertility was destroyed by cancer treatment.

headline.main: Chicago Court Gives Woman Frozen Embryos Despite Ex-Boyfriend’s Objections
headline.print_headline: Chicago Court Gives Woman Frozen Embryos Despite Ex-Boyfriend’s Objections
